name: Articles
body:
This page is an index of my articles and open source projects. -Manu Garg

My Articles

* [Sysenter Based System Call Mechanism in Linux 2.6](http://articles.manugarg.com/systemcallinlinux2_6.html)
* [About ELF Auxiliary Vectors](http://articles.manugarg.com/aboutelfauxiliaryvectors.html)
* [Sniffing in a Switched Network (pdf)](http://articles.manugarg.com/arp_spoofing.pdf), [(ppt version)](http://articles.manugarg.com/arp_spoofing.ppt)
* [Backing up Windows machines using rsync and ssh](http://articles.manugarg.com/backup_rsync.html)
* [Defeating Firewalls : Sneaking Into Office Computers From Home](http://articles.manugarg.com/ssh_tunneling.pdf)
* [Mighty Sockets](http://articles.manugarg.com/socket.html)
* [Procedure Call Sequence in C](http://articles.manugarg.com/stack.html)


My Projects

* [Pacparser - a library to parse proxy auto-configs](https://github.com/pacparser/pacparser)
* [Pactester - a tool to test proxy auto-configs](http://code.google.com/p/pactester)
* [A simple GUI based mailer](http://sourceforge.net/projects/pymailer/)

Copyright 2006 [Manu Garg+](http://google.com/+ManuGarg?rel=author) [(www.manugarg.com)](http://www.manugarg.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
